mapper.insert: insert into USERS(user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_phone, user_post, user_addr, user_detail_addr) values(#{userId},#{userPw},#{userName},#{userPhone},#{userPost},#{userAddr},#{userDetailAddr})
mapper.update: update users set user_Pw = #{userPw}, user_Name = #{userName}, user_Phone = #{userPhone}, user_Post = #{userPost}, user_Addr = #{userAddr}, user_Detail_Addr = #{userDetailAddr} where user_Id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select p.* from product p join cart c on p.prod_no = c.prod_no where user_id = #{userId}

select o.order_no, o.order_status, o.order_date, min(p.prod_no) as first_prod_no, min(p.prod_name) as first_prod_name, min(p.prod_image) as first_prod_image, min(p.prod_price) as first_prod_price, min(od.order_cnt) as first_order_cnt, count(p.prod_no) - 1 as prod_cnt from orders o join order_detail od on o.order_no = od.order_no join product p on p.prod_no = od.prod_no where o.order_status IN (1, 2, 3, 4) and o.user_id = #{user01} group by o.order_no, o.order_status, o.order_date order by o.order_date desc

select o.order_no, count(od.prod_no) as product_count from order_detail od JOIN orders o on o.order_no = od.order_no where (o.order_status = 1 or o.order_status = 2 or o.order_status = 3) and o.user_id = #{userId} group by o.order_no;

select o.order_no, o.order_status, o.order_date, min(p.prod_no) as first_prod_no, min(p.prod_name) as first_prod_name, min(p.prod_image) as first_prod_image, min(p.prod_price) as first_prod_price, min(od.order_cnt) as first_order_cnt, count(p.prod_no) - 1 as prod_cnt from orders o join order_detail od on o.order_no = od.order_no join product p on p.prod_no = od.prod_no where o.order_status IN (5, 6, 7, 8) and o.user_id = #{user01} group by o.order_no, o.order_status, o.order_date order by o.order_date desc

select p.prod_name, p.prod_image, p.prod_no, p.prod_price, o.*, od.order_cnt from order_detail od join orders o on o.order_no = od.order_no join product p on p.prod_no = od.prod_no
where o.user_id = #{userId} and o.order_no = #{orderNo}
